title: Integral Nation League Team LF Top and Support roles for Serious Team
body:
Our previous top and support were offered jobs and they interfere with team practice so we are looking to replace them. The team is sponsored by Integral Nation and our goal is to get into OPL.  Diamond +, ideally mained the role for a few months at least, working mic, previous experience with ranked teams preferred, flexible schedule, willing to sign contracts and depending on the success of the team, being able to move interstate.

PM - iNT Matrix PLT for potential trials/questions.
